issue.title: How to query if robot is initialized

content.raw: A competitor can opt to run each task in separate runs. Running through Task 1 there is no report that checkpoint 4 is completed. This leaves the competitors software uncertain if the final checkpoint for the task is completed if the separate task run option is followed.
content.html: A competitor can opt to run each task in separate runs. Running through Task 1 there is no report that checkpoint 4 is completed. This leaves the competitors software uncertain if the final checkpoint for the task is completed if the separate task run option is followed.
